content.detailedDescription:
I was viewing the constellations with binoculars on the morning of 2.8.15 at 6:56 and i was viewing the middle of three stars .. serpens caput i believe .. bright star top of triangle, double to my left, another star forming the right base of the triangle, when i saw a flash and 1/4 to 1/2 sec. later a second and last flash .. dim object and seemed to me to be stationary. its location within the triangle was slightly above and to the right of center.

when the object did not flash any more i scanned in a circle one binocular field out and then two fields out slowly, but saw no more.

i felt like it was watching me and wanted me to know it was up there.

i lost sight because it quit flashing .. it was cold and i stopped after about two minutes. went inside to get the time and subtracted two minutes.

what was it .. space junk?
content.summary: This small satilite blinked twice and stopped .. stationary, dim, flasher, serpans caput mid three stars w double to the left

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my dining room and happened to look out the window and saw two bright orange lights in the sky rather close to each other. i walked out the front door to see if it was a helicopter. to my suprise, there were multiple lights flying in the same direction. i called my two sons to come and look as there were many of these lights. at first i thought maybe the objects were asteroids or something. the light skept coming for approximately 7 minutes and made no sound but had a red spike like on the bottom. i tried to video it with my phone but it didn't turn out at all because of the street lights. the lights moved in the same direction and i lost sight of them from the tree line. i was able to reach my neighbor via telephone to come outside. he too, witnessed this light show.

the lights moved slow and made no noise. they appeared to be approximately 1000' in the sky. it was a cloudless, moonlight night.
content.summary: Fireball with red rod like spike on the bottom of each

content.detailedDescription:
Quiero comentar que proximo a las 22.30 del 31 de diciembre de 2014 en el ciudad de san ramon se avisto una luz brillante que se desplazaba de oste a este de color blanco muy intenso, cuando se encoontraba casi en el centro del cielo, emite unos destellos y cambia en forma brusca la direcciã³n y toma hacia el sur apagandoce poco tiempo despues sin dejar seã±al en un cielo despejado, el ovjeto no emitia sonido.
otro avistamiento sucediã³ el a la media noche sobre la nube de humo de los fuegos artificiales del 1 enero se veã­a una luz intensa de color blanco que a mi entender no era un satã©lite por la gran intensidad de la luz y la altura.
en la zona son frecuentes este tipo de fenã³menos gracias y a las ordenes.
content.summary: Luz muy brillante sin sonido que cambia de direccion,

content.detailedDescription:
I had gone for a walk late in the evening. it was warm and clear. i walked through a little neighborhood near our house. i was walking up a small incline on the edge of the park that crosses the train tracks and i looked up and saw a strange white thing that i at first thought was an owl.. then i realized it was much too big to be an owl.. but the odd thing was when i thought it was an owl it had the curve of a wing almost... i don't know if my brain was matrixing.. trying to find order in a shape so to speak.. but really it was much to big to be a bird.. it was about twenty feet above the trees and about two inches against the sky... it was not really dark but was not dusk either.. the light from the lamps along the lake lit things up artificially..Its hard to describe. sort of an orange light.. anyway. i saw the object and like i said i thought it was a bird.. then it changed.. it shifted. that is the only way i can describe it. one part sort of shifted... it changed its color sort of too.. it became blurry on the edges..I could see through part of it and towards the front it was almost solid. also the lights along the bike path reflected off the bottom of it. i hate to say this but the only way i can describe the shape it took after i realized it was not an owl was, well, it looked like a cartoon cloud. a lumpy little cartoon cloud. i do not know what the hell i saw. i know i am of sound mind.  i watched whatever it was.. to me it seemed like it had a purpose. dont ask me how i know that but it was on duty. it went on a straight path never varying in altitude or speed. it zoomed along at about thirty or thirty five miles an hour.. and i watched it until it was across the lake.. i went the half a block home and told my family.  

i hope i described it sufficiently... i honestly do not know how else to describe it.... if there are any questions please feel free to email me.. my mother wants me to write about some other things that happened when i was younger. those involved my entire family and a few family friends.. i do not know how this reporting works but i do fear ridicule although part of me does not care because i want to know if others have experienced what we did for years... anyway. :) thank you for listening and maybe someone can explain what i saw.... if it was something mundane, thats fine!!
content.summary: At first i thought it was an owl. but i realized it was much to large to be an owl. it was white at first then changed into a lumpy shaped object that almost looked like a cartoon cloud

content.detailedDescription:
This creature was seen twice once in this video and another time when looking out the window it had a thin form and a pinkish tinge to it.
i had a uv flash light and a low light setting. these kind things have been happening to me since i was a child.
content.summary: Some random life form

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the back yard around 10:40  pm,on a nice clear night  with no clouds present.I was going to take a picture of the full moon and when i looked through my camera phone i saw this enormous bright ball by the moon.The naked eye couldn't see it but my cell phone was able to pick it up, it stayed there for close to 2 hours in the same position, i called my friend who lives across town and he was also able to only see it with a camera. i have never seen anything this big and was real, please see the pictures . thanks mufon for letting us have a place to share our information
content.summary: About to take picture of moon on a clear night and saw this enormous bright ball by the moon

content.detailedDescription:
There is more to the story than you could ever imagine, it was life long before this and continues to this day, with . when it was not hiding it had a pink tinge to its skin when i saw it the second time it was totally visible that time. these kind of things have happened to me ever since i was a child. 
i uv flashlight with a low light setting. 
the date and time is slightly off.
content.summary: Ufos likely in the area

content.detailedDescription: Playing hide and go seek my buddy and i went out front of his dads house    as my sisters hid in back yard  we layed on top of his dads car and  started counting to 60  and  25 sec  in  there it was.  it did not move it was right over my head looking down at us i  melted off that car and ran to house i was dizzy  and scared looked back and my budy was in a trans four 8 sec we then ran in the house and told  what we seen no one beleivd   us
content.summary: Orbs abov my face

content.detailedDescription: While sitting at a stoplight in my vehicle facing southwest, i witnessed a bright blue-green orb of light with white trail fall vertically at high speed.  i took notice due it to being so bright and large in comparison to other lights in the sky.  at first i thought it might have been a firework, but no other display of lights were emitted.  it was not a "shooting star".  it was not an airplane.  no sound emitted that i could hear.  i lost sight of it as it dropped below tree line.  i estimate that it was several miles away from my location.  i was not impacted physically or emotionally.  have never witnessed an object like this before.
content.summary: Bright blue-green orb of light with white trail fell vertically at high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a craft, 80'diameter.It looked to be stainless steel cut from one sheet, no welds or rivets. blue see through windows. it was hovering 60' off the ground,i got within 100'of craft before the capt got it restarted, there was a storm i think it got struck by lightning, i could see a being go from front of craft to center where it seemed he was trying to reset something, the 3rd time the whoop whoop sound went to a whistle, and the air in front of craft got wavey, like a heat trace, the it shot out with a quickness! but then it stalled again right over locked/martin and dobbins afb, dobbins scramble d 4 jets with after burners at full blast. 2 from east runway and 2 from west runway. they got close but when the capt got it fired up this time he left this world!
the next day the marietta daily journal said it was a weather balloon?
but then they didn't have 911, my mom called marietta police dept. 
the switchboard was jammed!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I got within 100' of craft hovering 60' off ground, when alien got it started again it stalled right over locked martin& dobbins air force base,  4 jets were right on it before it left them in their dust , the next day the marietta daily journal said it w

content.detailedDescription: I was approaching the exit to the front entrance of twelve oaks when straight ahead i saw what appeared to be a bright bluish white light in the sky. it was descending rapidly and i quickly lost sight of it because of the trees in front of me. wasn't sure what to think of it, but i've never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Was leaving neighborhood and over the trees ahead of me i saw a bright descending something in the distance.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my yard on my ipad when something made me look up. above our house was a very bright, orange red glowing orb. it startled me immediately because it was very large and not in a typical flight path. there were no other lights on it, just a single glowing orb. it then started to head west at a very rapid pace. i jumped up and started yelling for my wife to come outside. i grabbed my phone and started video taping. my wife witnessed it as well. i continued to record it until i lost sight of it behind some trees and clouds.
i witness this same type of object in the same area in october 2012.
content.summary: Glowing orange-red orb hovering just south of my home at close range. it headed west at a steady, very fast speed. i finally lost sight behind some clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
On new years eve of 2014 at 7:35pm i was going out my back door while carrying my two year old son to take out the trash.  the trashcans are located about 15 feet from my back door directly left (90 degrees) from where i exit.  as soon as i stepped outside and turned west towards my trashcans, withhout having to look up, just looking forward, i could see this bright orange light flying rather low, seemed like 300-500 feet.  the strange thing was the light itself.  it was so bright but the color was of a deeper shade of orange, not as light as a pumpkkin, but more aof a reddish orange.  the closest comparison i can make is some street lights have a bright orange light, however the crafts was more red.  the light seemed to give off two trails of light that were not as bright as the source, but it almost seemed as if the two trails of light were the sides of the ufo, as if the bright light was in front and the two sides were lit, as if a triangle.  however, i could not make out anything regarding the shape of the craft due to how brighht the light was.  
i live near offutt air force base (15 miles), and there are two other airports within 30 miles so i see many types of jets, sesnas, 737's, etc.  this was much lower than any other plane that i have ever seen, and the light was not standard to what i have ever seen in reference to those planes.  the bright orange light never blinked, there was no other color of light, i could not decipher any noise at all from the craft, and i could only get a visual of the light for 25-30 seconds, as it flew directly over my neighborhood and then i lost it, due to my backdoor neighbors house blocked it out.  for this reason i could estimate the crafts altitude and speed.  it had to be traveling over a 200mph without a doubt.  i ran through my yard to get the best visuals before it disappeared.  there was very little wind, so i could rule out any type of new years eve lanterns or anything like that, plus it seemed to stay at the same altitude and speed the entire time, again no noise at all besides some quiet traffic noise from several hundred feet away on a street not that busy.  when i went inside, thinking about what i saw and how it doesn't match anything i have ever seen before, about 5-10 minutes later i could hear a helicopter flying over my neighborhood.  when i went back outside to inspect the helicopter i could tell by the noise that it was flying in the same direction as the craft headed, but i could never make a visual. i did not get a picture or video of the event, however i would be more than glad to upload pictures of my back yard and superimpose the approximate size, shape, and color of the light onto the where i saw it come and go to make a representation of what i saw if requested.  i would have done this already, however pics are proof and i have none.  just wanted to share my experience.
content.summary: Bright low flying orange light traveling several hundred mph

content.detailedDescription:
On the morning of december 13 2014, just before 8am est, i pulled up the blinds and saw a beautiful moon outside and immediately went and got my camera to take photos. suddenly, i noticed something strange; it looked like a strand of pearls. i had seen something similar before about 10 years ago but never had a chance to take a picture. my daughter and i researched "string of pearls" and came up with results suggesting ufos. upon zooming the photo in, i realized that it was a string of about 26 orb-like lights. 

to be thorough, here are the answers to the guideline questions:

1. i was at home and part of my morning routine is to open all the blinds around the apartment. i also enjoy bird watching and taking photos of the nature outside around this time.

2. while taking a photo of the moon, i noticed something stringlike and metallic shining near the moon (beneath it) and traveling slowly in a vertical direction.

3. when i initially noticed the object, i was baffled. it had no resemblance to anything i could identify.

4. the object was a long string of orb-like lights (initially metallic and then emitting a glowing whitish light) traveling at a slow and stead pace straight up into the sky. it appeared to disappear gradually, one orb at a time.

5. i felt excited and quickly took a picture of the object before it disappeared.

6. it disappeared gradually.
content.summary: String of pearls/orbs of light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were having a cigarette outside of our apartment, which happens to have planes flying over it all the time. we then seen a bright light moving pretty fast so i tried to zoom in on it with my phone, i couldn't get it steady to focus in on it but could tell it was pulsating a blue and white light at the same time, which i couldn't tell until i zoomed in. i kept trying to get a good shot of it but it disappeared out of my view! it didn't appear to be a plane because if i thought it was i wouldn't waste my time submitting a report!
content.summary: Looked like a solid light but when i zoomed in with my phone it was pusling with a blue and white light, planes fly in this area all the time so i can tell the difference between the two

content.detailedDescription: Im small town èierna voda, near to galanta.
content.summary: Red lights

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: In texas next to el paso a small town called cornudas in sun set ranches in the south part of subdivision over big ben trail mountain i experience many ufo sightings radiation at night sparks and electric statics every night they fly and fight in the sky literally war in the sky i found big steps with small foot prints on the ground my wife a non believer became a terrified believer one night why'll in deep sleep i was bothered by sun like light no wind no noise that can remember i would toast and turn for most of the night at one point i had enough i got up and open the door and i looked and i was being blind by a sun like light at but white light but rounded like a moon maybe at 200 - 300 feet i went back to sleep disoriented of what was going on. in the morning realizing what had happened i had many encounter in my life from a prayer for help and looking up at the sky and seeing a round floating transparent ball that turned into a disk shape to a glowing purple blue red orange ball at f.I.U. in miami fl well i found a ufo crash sight about 4000 feet from my property in texas in the sunset ranches  maybe  you guys can get to it before the us government get to it  i was gonna keep it a secret but i would be doing the same as the government they seem to have lead me to move there and they seem to follow me i know they followed me in and out of florida every trip
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Everyday there are ufo in the sky at night are more visible one morning i was in a deep sleep bothered by sun like light out side rv tried to go back to sleep but could not in one of the a temp's to sleep i had got up to look and open the door to see aa u

content.detailedDescription: 6:31 am going to work and seen a bright light moving fast and it stop moving and i seen it i said know that's a ufo  it laying on the side with red,green ,blue white lights,the movement was very fast my actions was to take pictures and video go this because the last time it was in 1984 and it was six of us then but we never take about it.The first one was round and this was round and long and did not lose sight of it i just left for thinking i have some prove
content.summary: It was my second one in my of seeing one but this time i have it on my phone pictures and video

content.detailedDescription:
Between 1957 nd 1960 i  saw what looked like a slice of pie on a full moon.
the size at the widest point looked to be about 1/6 to 1/8th slice. as i sat and watched it seemed to back straight out with the moon glow filling in as it went. when it had completely backed out i could no longer discern it. 

i was east of town in the woods on a dirt road sitting in a car by myself. i have always been the outdoor type. if that was an extraterrestrial object, the sheer size is mind numbing. if it landed on earth it would surely take up several zip codes. this all happened when i was a teen and speaking to others the following day, they saw nothing. i would think something that large would have attracted other witnesses. the idea of a triangle before they became popular is amazing in itself. of course i could just be a ufo nut
but that is the only siting i've ever had.
content.summary: Triangle on moon

content.detailedDescription: Tell me what you guys think, i'll artach the video please let me no it was weird.Please use things to clear video
content.summary: Weird

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my fiancee witnessed two triangle objects in the sky about 8:40pm the lower end of the triangles had bright blue points while the top end had bright pink lights. one would blink on and off and the other would answer with its own series of blinks. neither of us had had any drinks, and were surprised by what we saw. we drove to a store, and after parking could still see them clearly. when coming back out into the parking lot; both objects were gone. there were no stars in their place, it was just a regular clear night. i will add that when we first saw them, there was also a plane in the air much higher then the objects themselves. our phones were not working well, and my laptop wasn't receiving any signal. neither of which has ever happened before. when i looked at them the hair on the back of my neck raised (i don't know what that might mean to you) i didn't feel afraid, but i felt that there might have been an energy in the air that we as humans might not understand. we tried to take a picture, but our phones just wouldn't work. every time we pointed them towards the objects our phones would just show static.
content.summary: Two objects about two football fields apart

content.detailedDescription: I went out to my balcony to get some air and was looking out west. i saw two blue pulsating orbs move up about 300 feet hover then descend down. i observed them doing this for about 10 minutes. they did this about three times in the course of 10 minutes. it looked close to the redondo beach pier. as they went up and hovered they also changed direction and go north just a bit then went up higher then descended. they were a bright blue. i have photos from my iphone. and a video. the pics are clearer.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two pulsating blue orbs ascending hovering and descending

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 0001 to 0015 i was headed northbound on 710 freeway. i observed on my left bright lights passing downtown los angeles headed south. i took my eyes off the object to continue to drive. the next event was the lights turned toward my position on the freeway. from the time i looked down the road to the time i saw the object again was 1-2 minutes. i witnessed this gigantic object lights changing from red to red green; from blue to blue green. the object was approximately 500-1000 feet above me and flew over the rear of my car. the direction the object was heading was southeast. 

the object was about the size of a football stadium; circular, and no noise was emitting from the object. i cannot fathom a football stadium moving to abruptly and quietly. the one thing stands out about this object was it looked as though it had 3-4 stories with lights constantly changing.
content.summary: Ufo was se from my position on 720 fwy heading north to 10 fwy east

content.detailedDescription: On 2/6/2015 at roughly 1:15 in the morning i went outside my home to smoke a cigarette. i stepped down my steps and something made me look up. i said what the heck is that...At first i thoight it was a chinese lantern or something on fire then it was a white bright light with orange fire behind it. it scared me...I thought it was going to hurt me or beam me up... it was like it knew i was there..It didn't move then... if i had a ladder i could grab it, it seemed that close.I then ran inside n grabbed my phone & binoculars so i could get pics. it was higher in the sky now bright orange like a fire ball.Orange,& yellow .I took pictures then a video until i couldn't see it anymore. i then took my binoculars and spotted it, but with my naked eye i couldn't see it. i wanted to call someone but all my family & friends were in bed. the moon was out as you can see in the pictures....Does anyone know what it could be?
content.summary: Very bright looked like flames hovered for seconds then moved in the night sky couldn't see it then w naked eye needed binoculars

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a ciggerate out my back door. i thought i seen a green lightening bug and i looked closer and seen the light on the right side was saying on. the light on the left was slowly pulsating. it was about 50 foot wide and hoovered for about 8 seconds. then it started assending up over the pine trees. then it desended over to the other side. the two lights where pointed east and west as it was flying north. i felt like it was watching me. it was acting like it was trying to stay under the radar or didn't want to be seen. i observed it for about two mintues. i got in my car and drove down the road to where i saw it and it was gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: One light pulsating and one light steady assended over the trees and back down.

content.detailedDescription: In 2013 my girlfriend (at he time), her family, and myself went to the pueblo reservoir for her birthday. we spent 3 days there and on our last night there i saw multiple crafts hovering around and on the reservoir as well as around our camping grounds. there were bright flashing  (pulsating) with humanoids standing on the water, pot a potty, and picnic tables in the area. i sat and watched them watching me for about an hour before i went to sleep.
content.summary: One craft was a pyramid shape the others werw disk

content.detailedDescription:
We were coming west from portsmouth, ohio toward west portsmouth, ohio on u.S. route 52. we saw a light just over the hilltop and close to a cellphone tower, and over west portsmouth.

it hovered and we turned onto route 104/73 to see it better and get closer, as we got closer, it begin to move to the north and suddenly disappear.

it looked like a bright planet or space station but when it moved and disappeared i realized it was something else.
content.summary: Watched bright, hovering light that begin to move then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was takeing pics of sunset and saw the object. at first it was loveing from north west direction then it stoped it began flashing in two tone color of yellowish gold to a reddish. that was what go my attention, then as i was focusing my camera on it it begain to change coarse in a northern direction it stoped and i began to get excited cause i knew it wasn't a plane i was seeing. the change indirection was to quick. it moved closer into view and i could see it was a bell like shape with what appeared to be a triangular shape patrudeing from the underside. i've had these pics in my possession for a few years now and showed them to other people and they all agreed it was very strange in shape. sent a copy to n.A.S.A to see what if anything they thought it might be and haven't heard from them to this day.But ever since i sent them my yahoo account has been frozen and i can't access it. i'm glad i never sent the originals. please help me figure this out. it's driving me crazy wondering what it might be strange things have been happening to me ever since i captured it in the pics. like unexplainable black outs and night terrors that seem way to real. every time i think about it the hair literally stands up on the back of my neck. who knows , maybe it's all just psycho synaptic,and just paranoia.
content.summary: Was takeing pics of sunset when i saw object i obtained thre pics of object before it shot out of atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: Outside took apictiure of the sun just to see if i could. later that night i looked at the picture and noticed the object.
content.summary: Green sphere

content.detailedDescription:
We were coming from jersey mike's with my wife driving down the josephine rd in garner, nc, once i noticed something in the sky. it was three very bright lights moving in line. my wife noticed them too and pulled over. the lights stopped over a neighborhood and formed a triangle and hovered.

moments from this one light dissappeared and two of the lights started slowly moving towards smithfield , nc.

after those two lights started to fade the one that dissapeared  suddenly appeared again , this time it was really bright orange. the light slowly started to fade.

i had atleast 6 or 7 other people observing this phenomena. i tried to get some footage but my camera would not focus because it was too dark.

i got one low quality picture of two of the lights.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Saw glowing lights in the sky.
